Description.Text:
Centrally located between Greenwich and Midtown, Chelsea Apartments is within walking distance from the Meatpacking District, the Flatiron building and Union Square. Times Square, Central Park, Greenwich Village, Soho, and other New York City destinations are within few blocks away from the Apart Hotel. Nearby subway lines transport guests to Manhattan's attractions. On 32nd Street, Penn Station trains. Chelsea Apartments present elegant interior designs and comfortable furnishings to make the most of a New York City stay. The hotel offers well-appointed one bedroom, two bedroom and three bedroom apartments. Each apartment is air-conditioned and provides full kitchens and dining areas, cable/satellite TV, private bathrooms, queen bed. Each unit's living room sofa converts to a sleeper. High-speed Internet is available. Chelsea Apartments is a smoke free hotel.
Check-in Instructions: Please note, this is walk up property with no elevator, operated by a virtual doorman.

Upon arrival you will find an intercom located on the entry door. Push the button to be connected to our call center, available 24 hours 7 days a week.

After identifying yourself the call center will provide you with a unit number and a four digit code to enter the room. In the apartment you will find a key for the front door of the location, which will give you an independent access to the building during your stay.

Centrally located between Greenwich and Midtown, Chelsea Apartments is within walking distance from the Meatpacking District, the Flatiron building and Union Square. Times Square, Central Park, Greenwich Village, Soho, and other New York City destinations are within few blocks away from the Apart Hotel. Nearby subway lines transport guests to Manhattan's attractions. On 32nd Street, Penn Station trains.

Two Bedroom - The room offers 1 Queen bed + 1 Sofa Bed along with Air conditioning , Alarm clock, Bathroom amenities, CD player, Color TV, DVD player, Hairdryer, Heating, Internet access, Iron / Ironing board, Kettle, Kitchenette, Laundry service, Microwave oven, Mini bar, Non-smoking rooms, Radio, Refrigerator, Tea and coffee making facilities, Telephone, Toaster.Armchair in living room with area rug, coffee table, four-chair dining set, CD/cassette player, TV with DVD player. Fully equipped kitchen with four-burner range, full-sized refrigerator, toaster. Shower/tub, pedestal sink. Complimentary local calls. (One complimentary housekeeping visit per minimum seven-day stay.) Smoking not permitted.

Fully equipped kitchen with four-burner range, full-sized refrigerator, toaster. Shower/tub, pedestal sink. Complimentary local calls. (One complimentary housekeeping visit per minimum seven-day stay.) Smoking not permitted.
